sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-how-it-works', templateUrl: './how-it-works.component.html', styleUrls: ['./how-it-works.component.scss'] }) export class HowItWorksComponent { }

Users can easily browse through the categories on your menu to find the used medical equipment and medications they need. They can view the product details and specifications to determine if it meets their needs.

Users can use the contact form on the website or send an email to request additional information about the used medical-supplies and medication they're interested in. Contact the seller and collect informations.

For SELLERS : After communicating with you and determining the item they need is available, users can arrange to pick up the used product at the designated location. and seller can delete and modify the product.



FOR BUYERS : If you want to post a request in order to search some medicaments or medical-supplies in a cheaper prices you should sign up and post a request. After posting a request, others will show your demand.

FOR SELLERS : If you want to post an announcement in order to provide some medicaments or medical-supplies in a cheaper prices you should sign up. Also, you can check requests and procide the service.
